A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the movie feeling a sense of disappointment and being unfulfilled.  I felt this movie was a large departure from the original series.  The humor was at times funny\, but many other times forced and a distraction.  This is a space drama\, not Guardians of the Galaxy.  The characters lacked depth and often times came across a whining instead of strong.  Death of important characters lacked power.  The story lacked depth.  How can the Resistance constantly make the same mistakes over and over without learning a lesson.  How can you make Luke Skywalker such a pathetic human being.  There were some very strong visual moments\, some great battles\, but also unnecessary scenes that did not add to the story over 2.5 hours.  The movie was a disappointment from beginning to end.
